author: julianfoad
msg: Introduce a macro "U_()" for marking messages that are not useful for
translation, to indicate that a conscious decision was made not to translate
(I removed the part of the patch that actually marked some strings this way,
choosing to remove those strings completely instead in r33835.)
Tweak to acknowledge that not all error messages are to be translated.

author: julianfoad
msg: Change some internal error detection code to use the generic SVN_ERR_ASSERT
and SVN_ERR_MALFUNCTION macros instead of specific messages, because the
user won't benefit from knowing the particular flavour of bug. In these
instances, the messages were being reported with the error code
SVN_ERR_WC_CORRUPT, but the bugs being detected were of the "incomplete
implementation" or "in-memory corruption" varieties. This change also
(This change was first applied as part of r33832 and reverted in r33834.)

author: julianfoad
msg: Revert r33832 which accidentally had two unrelated changes.

author: sbutler
msg: Make 'svn status' report tree conflict victims only, not the parent
directory (we were reporting both for a while).  Enable reporting of
tree conflict status for victims that do not exist.
Update all relevant test expectations. Fix the status-checking code
so we can check missing items.
(print_status): Don't hijack the first column for tree conflicts.
is_sendable_status): Set tree_conflicted field to TRUE for all tree
conflict victims, including some missing victims, instead of their
(close_directory): Don't set conflict status for a victim's parent dir.
(build_tree_from_status): Change the regexp and code to be compatible
(update_with_nested_adds): Take advantage of real unquiet status check.
tree_conflicts_on_switch_2): Expect tree conflicts on victims (some
of them missing) rather than on their parents.
victims (some of them missing) rather than on their parents.

author: julianfoad
msg: Two changes committed at once. Reverted later in r33834, to be re-applied
